sentence: Geoff Bennett: Six years after the death of Michael Brown pushed Bush into the political arena, Generation Z is making its way into the halls of power, fueled by the police killings of George Floyd and Breonna Taylor in 2020.
author: Geoff Bennett
title: A new era of lawmakers driven from protests to the halls of power
